TopicTitle: The Dark Crystal - Age of Resistance

Articles.Content:
I remember going to see the original movie in the theaters when I was a boy. The allegorical parallels with nuclear armageddon made it all the more scary for a kid like me who grew up during the cold war. Even so, I'm looking forward to seeing this new series:

It took them long enough!

Oh wow, I remember that. A series, huh? Interesting.....

So long I'd forgotten all about it. 

Edited May 19, 2017 by StrandedonEarth
Wow, that looks like it will be good.  Glad they're sticking with the oldschool techniques, it'd probably have been easier to go the cgi route.
